articles.headline: Building it from scratch: WTC victim database
articles.summary: USA Today created a comprehensive database to document the lives lost in the 9/11 attacks, challenging official death tolls and chronicling the victims' final moments.

articles.headline: Mining workplace data
articles.author_title: NICAR and Missouri School of Journalism
articles.summary: An exploration of workplace data, including stories of immigrant worker abuse and resources for examining employer practices.

articles.headline: Following the riverboat pilots
articles.summary: Investigation into Louisiana's archaic system for selecting and regulating Mississippi River pilots, revealing nepotism and other systemic issues.
